adverb.description: With an important role; to a large extent.
examples: the actor is to figure prominently in the marketing campaign
his wife was prominently involved in local politics

adverb.description: In a manner that projects or protrudes from something.
examples: because of their height, the towers stand out prominently
he left his comb protruding prominently from a pile of objects

adverb.description: So as to catch the attention; conspicuously.
examples: posters were prominently displayed in the hall
Paxton's name appears prominently above the title
